body_html:
nvidia-docker command is still available for backwards compatility with nvidia-docker2.
This script gets installed on your system once you install nvidia docker v2
https://github.com/NVIDIA/nvidia-docker/blob/master/nvidia-docker
body_text:
nvidia-docker command is still available for backwards compatility with nvidia-docker2.
This script gets installed on your system once you install nvidia docker v2
https://github.com/NVIDIA/nvidia-docker/blob/master/nvidia-docker
body:
`nvidia-docker` command is still available for backwards compatility with nvidia-docker2.
This script gets installed on your system once you install nvidia docker v2
https://github.com/NVIDIA/nvidia-docker/blob/master/nvidia-docker
